TopicTitle: [Showcase] Post Your Station Service Vehicles here (Mod and Stock)

Articles.Content:
Basically post any craft that can make it from a station in orbit, down to the planet (craft will be grouped by planet/moon), optionally be refuelled planetside by a kethane mining base and then launch and re-dock with the station in orbit. If the craft can restock the station with Kerbals or Fuel/mono all the better.

I`m looking to start a place where if you want a craft that can refuel an orbital station around Eeloo for example, you could come here and just download a craft you know can do the job.

Please list any mods or say if your craft is stock and if possible how much spare Dv/mono you have after getting to orbit and docking with a full load. A launcher is not needed, you can just post the lander if you like.

I`ll start with my Duna personal shuttle/base. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12775588/Duna%20Lander.craft

It has mechjeb 2.08 and empty fuek tanks mods and can carry 3 kerbals from a station, to Duna and back.

Edited June 14, 2013 by John FX
Always updating

Here is my Kethane miner for Minmus (or any low gravity moon)

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12775588/Kethane%20Minmus%20lander.craft

It uses Kethane Mod, Damned Robotics, TAC fuel balancer, Kethane Debugger, Novapunch 300Kn NERVA,speedy 6000 fusion reactor.
Don`t all post at once like that, it`s confusing.

Crew Transfer Vehicle, designed to take up to four Kerbals from a space station around Kerbin and back, intended as a rescue vehicle.

Uses small rockets when nearing the ground to soften the landing of the capsule

Edited June 15, 2013 by SDIR

To show images first you need to host them online (as you have already done) then find the link. I use imageshack so all my images are in one place and I right click and get an option for the link. I then copy and paste the link.

A link looks like this

http://imageshack.us/a/img829/4439/screenshot25z.png

except at the start there is IMG and at the end there is /IMG with IMG being inside [] and /IMG being inside [] (I can`t show you them complete because then they forum will show the image)

so you want a [ followed by IMG then ]. Then you put your link with no spaces http://imageshack.us/a/img829/4439/screenshot25z.png then a [ with /IMG and a final ]. No spaces anywhere.

If I cut and paste the bits from above I get

Ok, here is my escape pod for planets with an atmosphere. It has 500 Dv of fuel to deorbit from the station and for final landing although most of the decelleration is done with aerobraking and a parachute. It has space for 1 kerbal.

I`ll post the craft file as soon as I finish this long Jool intercept burn in my 500T station...

EDIT : Here you go, http://www./view/gbjjdk2ir1bpk19/Escape_Pod_(Atmo_500Dv).craft

Edited June 14, 2013 by John FX
Added craft file

Thanks! Here's a picture of the CTV in orbit then

Lower section is the orbiter module which houses the fuel and engine and the main solar panels. The crew section can hold up to 7 kerbals and has a detachable heat shield for reentry, and soft landing rockets. Also includes an abortion system during take-off.

Will be uploading craft file with launcher shortly.
